title: Intermittent Connection, Disconnects every couple of minutes, Morgantown Area of WV 4/19/17
body: Starting two days ago around 1:00am EST, me and some friends living in the surrounding area of Morgantown, WV have been unable to play League of Legends due to intermittent spotty connection. We believe that it's on the fault of Comcast Xfinity and not on the fault of Riot.

replies.body: Hey, thanks for the heads up!  Were you able to locate any status alerts from your ISP about this?  I haven't heard anything about it, but I'll certainly keep an eye out.  In the meantime, run a [traceroute ](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/)to our game server (104.160.131.1) so we can try and locate any hiccups along the way.  Hoping things kick back into gear asap!
